channel.title: Firearms: Source
channel.description:
In case you didn't know, FA: S was released on Friday. It's a source version of the Goldsrc mod Firearms made in 2003. I'm not the biggest FA fan but the original game was pretty cool in that there was a boatload of weapons you can choose (and carry!) at once and had interesting gameplay. The new source version seems to have preserved that awesomeness
Thoughts/experiences on the mod?
[url]https://www.firearms-source.com/[/url]

item.title: Firearms: Source
item.dc:creator: Ham_Solo
item.description:
FFFUUU:

Looks like Combat Arms on Source, but I still like it. Got my download when I come back to New York

Looks like Firearms on source to me.
Anyway, I only played a few rounds yet, but it was fun.

item.title: Firearms: Source
item.dc:creator: Spooboy
item.description:
Maps are poorly optimized, level design is terrible, and there aren’t…that many guns. It’s not very great, I don’t like it.

Read full topic

item.title: Firearms: Source
item.dc:creator: Maxey
item.description:
I’ll admit. I was a bit confused at first that there were no iron sights. Then I remembered this was just a translation of the original mod into the Source engine with no big changes done to it.

Still fun but I’m no longer used to these fast paced online shooters anymore. Too many hours of BC2.

Read full topic
